definition: to abandon self for others (idiom); to sacrifice oneself to help the people/altruism
to give up/to abandon/to give alms
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa

sentences.english: Eg: The heroes made an instant decision to risk their own lives to save others.
sentences.chinese: 英雄們立刻做出了捨己救人的決定。
